tr.td: (IntOpt) Time to cache the revocation list and the revocation events (in seconds). This has no effect unless global and token caching are enabled.
(BoolOpt) Toggle for revocation event caching. This has no effect unless global caching is enabled.
(StrOpt) Entrypoint for an implementation of the backend for persisting revocation events in the keystone.revoke namespace.
(IntOpt) This value (calculated in seconds) is added to token expiration before a revocation event may be removed from the backend.
